title: 16-bit Action Platformer Music Pack
description: 10 hard rock/heavy metal tracks in a retro 16-bit style. 20 files.
longDescription:
Link to the demos!


A collection of 10 hard rock/heavy metal tracks in a retro 16-bit style, inspired in classic action platformer games. The music has a strong, exciting and energetic mood that will fit any action oriented, racing or battle games.

This is the 16-bit version of my “Action Platformer Music Pack”, and was created sampling the same recorded instruments and sounds.


This pack includes 10 tracks, each with a loop edit for convenience: 

All tracks are .wav, 44.1kHz, 16 bits


  • Achieving Victory 16-bit (1:58)
  • Achieving Victory 16-bit - Loop (1:55)
  • Against the Enemy 16-bit (2:11)
  • Against the Enemy 16-bit - Loop (2:08)
  • Back Into Action 16-bit (2:28)
  • Back Into Action 16-bit - Loop (2:22)
  • Enemy Ahead 16-bit (2:05)
  • Enemy Ahead 16-bit - Loop (2:02)
  • Enemy Fortress 16-bit (2:06)
  • Enemy Fortress 16-bit - Loop (1:58)
  • Gathering Strength 16-bit (2:07)
  • Gathering Strength 16-bit - Loop (2:06)
  • Overcoming Obstacles 16-bit (2:01)
  • Overcoming Obstacles 16-bit - Loop (2:00)
  • Righteous Battle 16-bit (2:00)
  • Righteous Battle 16-bit - Loop (1:56)
  • Saving the City 16-bit (1:51)
  • Saving the City 16-bit - Loop (1:48)
  • Strong Foe 16-bit (2:09)
  • Strong Foe 16-bit - Loop (2:08)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 high quality 16-bit style hard rock/metal tracks
  •  10 loop edits


Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1kHz/16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 41:27 (including loop edits)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
